text:
@FLOTUS If only someone had warned us... in January... that we needed to take this virus seriously... like, maybe on JANUARY 26th...

Oh.
Someone did... while your husband was still holding rallies and playing golf and calling the warnings a "hoax".
https://t.co/Q4PAIKnXd5
